name: Cuby Rescue Bot
description:
Sadly, another unfinished game... And that's a shame too, because it was a super cool idea...

Oh right... The controls are:

  • X to go Forward
  • Z and C to Turn Left and Turn Right

This was meant to be the game's description, but keep in mind that half of the content in this text isn't in the game at the moment:

"Cuby is a rescue bot that needs to find a box of supplies in a dangerous building and take it to the rescue team.

But Cuby is a small robot, and his infrared signal are weak, so the minimum obstacle is enough to make the rescue team lose control of him, luckly there are some camera around the building to help you.

And if enough isn't enough, the rescue team dosen't know where the box of supply is (And they need it FAST!), so they have to make Cuby teleport trought the building and hope they can get to the box in time.

Will you live up to this task???"

In the future maybe i'll return to this, but this time [intensely staring at The Hole In The Mug project with disappointment] i don't want to make any promises that i can't mantain...

(Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam, By Marxy 37)
